Dear Muhannad,

Can you urgently provide our statement of account for the net balance of invoices still outstanding, both debit and credit, including the SAR 234k requested for payment?

Appreciate if you can provide this information urgently as we have 200 stores facing issues because we cannot show the malls the renewed insurance documentation.

The malls reject all requests, store openings, entry permits, renovations, etc... Without the insurance documentation, our operation is seriously affected.

As such, please provide the updated statement urgently because we need to fix this issue one way or another.

Appreciate your support.

Best Regards,
Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
